name: zendframework/zend-feed
description: provides functionality for consuming RSS and Atom feeds

suggest.psr/http-message: PSR-7 ^1.0, if you wish to use Zend\Feed\Reader\Http\Psr7ResponseDecorator
suggest.zendframework/zend-cache: Zend\Cache component, for optionally caching feeds between requests
suggest.zendframework/zend-db: Zend\Db component, for use with PubSubHubbub
suggest.zendframework/zend-http: Zend\Http for PubSubHubbub, and optionally for use with Zend\Feed\Reader
suggest.zendframework/zend-servicemanager: Zend\ServiceManager component, for easily extending ExtensionManager implementations
suggest.zendframework/zend-validator: Zend\Validator component, for validating feeds and Atom entries in the Writer subcomponent
